synopsis.text: In this Haikyuu!! OVA episode set after the first season, star volleyball players Shouyou Hinata and Tobio Kageyama fail an important test right before their team's crucial upcoming Tokyo training camp. As a result, they are at risk of missing the camp to take make-up exams. Desperate to play volleyball, Hinata and Kageyama plead with school administrators to change the exam date but are denied. With the exams conflicting with the Tokyo trip, the two must pass their retakes to participate. Their teammates band together, devising creative ways to help the pair study so they can join the camp as originally planned. Filled with classic Haikyuu!! camaraderie and humor, this lighthearted special episode focuses on Hinata and Kageyamaâ€™s academic struggle. Will the volleyball stars manage to pass their tests and attend the vital Tokyo training?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
